title: Hong Kong: wandering with Rick
brief_description: With Rick we take a ferry-boat across Repulse Bay and catch a cable car up Victoria Peak for a panoramic view of Hong Kong. We ride a sampan from a fishing village, visit the busy docks of Hong Kong harbour and enjoy a rick-shaw ride through crowqded city streets.
